channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree branch growth blocking pavement, 14th July
item.description:
Tree branch growth blocking pavement. Can you trim as this is a problem for walking on the pavement. There are other trees in need of pruning as well on East Dulwich grove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 129, East Dulwich Grove, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead rat on path beside canal, 14th July
item.description:
Dead rat on the path beside Broadwater Canal. Behind the houses on the West of Whinchat Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Whinchat Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and assorted rubbish next to canal, 14th July
item.description:
Bags of textiles (some faded and look as though they’ve been there for some time), car mats, part of fibre board furniture. On path beside Broadwater Canal, to the rear of the houses on the West side of Whinchat Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Whinchat Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Name Plate, 14th July
item.description:
Reported back in October, 2024, but you’ve done nothing about it. Pickford Road at the junction with The Avenue, Bexleyheath: Please replace the street name plate for Pickford Road which is illegible to members of the public - picture attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars engine pops late at night, 13th July
item.description:
Late at night a silver car with engine fault, deliberately driving the engine at speed as to loud popping noise. Lunch times and early hours of the night. Annoying to housing. Sorry no idea of model or number.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsmead Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree ment to of been cut and crowned 4/5 weeks ago, 13th July
item.description:
Keep getting told this tree will be cut then the case gets closed and still nothing if this isn’t done in next week I will report to councilor and mp who I’ve been in contact with and been told if isn’t done to contact them

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Keedonwood Road, Sundridge, London

item.title: Being loud, generally drunk outside, 13th July
item.description:
Night time being loud, no care for others. Near to residential area. Raised voices. Neighbourhood should be aware of noise nuisance. Not sure if they are new tenants. Can be heard in next street. Almost midnight now.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adley Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assorted flytipping, 13th July
item.description:
Glass door off cabinet, pile of carpet and garden waste, dog fouling on path beside Broadwater canal running behind the houses on Whinchat Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whinchat Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van partially parked on pavement, 13th July
item.description:
This very large van has consistently parked in this position encroaching more than halfway onto the pavement for 8 weeks now at 120 Lyham rd, this has caused near misses with pedestrians walking out from the van specifically children but adults as well when I am driving off my driveway at 118 Lyham rd there has been many near misses with cyclists too. Requests to the landlord to remove it have been ignored! It is blocking a safe view of the road as well which is a hazard and could cause a serious accident. I request it be removed because it is too long for the driveway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyham Road, Streatham Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In front of 76 Gloucester Avenue., 13th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Avenue, Chalk Farm, London

item.title: Cheerios Juice bar coffee shop, Kilburn station Christchurch avenue, 13th July
item.description:
Bill board belonging to the coffee shop taking up large area of pavement very large. Walked into it and hurt myself it’s unnecessary to be there makes getting safely along an issue. Must be worse during the commute when crowded at the station, hope no one hurts themselves on it like I did.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
